thread.title: Man Utd news: 2000 points reaches and Chris Smalling is delighted | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: 2000 points reaches and Chris Smalling is delighted | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: 2000 points reaches and Chris Smalling is delighted | Metro News
text:
Simon Rice for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 6:06 pm Anthony Martial is congratulated by Chris Smalling after his goal against Watford (Getty) 
Manchester United have been the dominant club in the Premier League era and that fact was brought home yesterday when they became the first club to accumulate 2,000 points. 
The Red Devils beat Watford 2-0 at Old Trafford on Saturday thanks to goals from Juan Mata and Anthony Martial and the three points they picked up took them to the milestone. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
Since the inception of the league in 1992 theyâ€™ve played 949 matches and won the title 13 times. 
The nearest challenger is Arsenal, who have accumulated 1,797 points and then Chelsea with 1,756 after their 1-1 draw with Burnley on Sunday. Top six most points
